text: Yesterday I posted the announcement video for Microsoft's new AR headset "HoloLens", and I was skeptical. But having read Ars's and now RPS's reaction to it, I'm too excited. drool. <http://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2015/01/22/minecraft-hololens-minecraft-reality/>

attachments.text: What's Minecraft like to play when it's a holograph being projected around your living room?
